name: ncsa.clowder-model-inference
description: Extracts predictions from a trained sequence classification model in Clowder
author: Vismayak Mohanarajan

BASE_MODEL_NAME.title: Model name
BASE_MODEL_NAME.description: The name of the foundation model used, used to get appropriate tokenizer

MODEL_FILE_ID.title: Model file ID
MODEL_FILE_ID.description: The Clowder file id of the model file

DATASET_FILE_ID.title: Dataset file ID
DATASET_FILE_ID.description: The Clowder file id of the dataset file to be used for inference

PREDICTIONS_FILE_NAME.title: Predictions file name
PREDICTIONS_FILE_NAME.description: The name of the file to store the predictions
